question: Who has been named the PCA Player of the Year 2019?
explanation: England all-rounder Ben Stokes has been named the 2019 PCA (Professional Cricketers\' Association) Â Player of the Year award after his splendid show in the 2019 ICC Cricket World Cup and a remarkable unbeaten 135 run to win the third Ashes Test against Australia at Headingley.
